item.title: A Vim Purist's Workflow
item.description: I have been using Vim for about 1.5 years now and I am constantly surprised about how many features it has. Despite using it for many smaller projected, I wasn’t sold on using Vim as my main programming environment, and even then, it was only with CoC installed to essentially replicate VS Code in Vim. Until I stumbled across this video by Leeren at VimConf . This completely blew my mind (as did his other videos on Vim).
